SEARCH
Package reflector

Class Reflector

java.lang.Object
reflector.Reflector
public class Reflector extends Object
Reflector is a master reflection class which the entire bot is built off of. It contains helper functions to make reflection much less of a pain.

    • mudInvoker

      public Object mudInvoker(orsc.mudclient mud, String methodName, Object... params)
      This function will call `methodName` with `params` inside of `mud`.
      Parameters:
      mud - -- the mud object
      methodName - -- the method name as a case sensitive string
      params - -- parameters, as a list
      Returns:
      the return value of the specified `methodName` function

    • getClassMember

      public Object getClassMember(String className, String member)
      This function will grab the `member` object from the specified `className`. *** THIS DOES NOT RECURSE DOWN INTO CHILD OBJECTS. SEE OTHER FUNCTIONS FOR THAT CAPABILITY. ***
      Parameters:
      className - -- the EXACT name of the class, down to the period. case sensitive.
      member - -- the EXACT name of the member of the class. case sensitive.
      Returns:
      the object requested, or null.

    • getObjectMember

      public Object getObjectMember(Object obj, String member)
      This function will grab the `member` object from the specified `obj`. *** THIS DOES NOT RECURSE DOWN INTO CHILD OBJECTS. SEE OTHER FUNCTIONS FOR THAT CAPABILITY. ***
      Parameters:
      obj - -- the object to retrieve data from.
      member - -- the EXACT name of the member of the class. case sensitive.
      Returns:
      the object requested, or null.

    • getObjectMemberFromSuperclass

      public Object getObjectMemberFromSuperclass(Object obj, String member)
      Retrieves the member from the given object. It WILL work on superclass objects.
      Parameters:
      obj - -- object to retrieve from
      member - -- exact name of the object to return
      Returns:
      requested object, or null if it does not exist

    • setObjectMember

      public void setObjectMember(Object obj, String member, Object value)
      Sets the specified member inside of the object to the specified value.
      Parameters:
      obj - -- the object to modify
      member - -- the member of said object to modify
      value - -- the value to set obj.member to.
